  • Method Details

    • onNameBtnClick

      protected void onNameBtnClick()
      When the check button next to the name field is clicked, this method disables the field and the button, and assigns the string to the name attribute.

    • onNameFldEnter

      protected void onNameFldEnter(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent ke)
      it calls the onNameBtnClick method when pressing enter key while typing in the name field
      Parameters:
      ke - key pressed from the keyboard

    • showConfirm

      protected void showConfirm(javafx.event.Event e)
      Shows an image with a different number of player for each option when choosing the game's size
      Parameters:
      e - event of the MenuItem clicked, needed to know which option is currently selected

    • onConfirmBtnClick

      protected void onConfirmBtnClick(javafx.event.Event e)
      Assigns the number of player chosen to the right attribute and disables the menu.
      Parameters:
      e - event of the MenuItem clicked, needed to know which option is currently selected

      Parameters:

      curr - current size of the game
      size - maximal and desired size of the game
